text:
I choose to go in section information communication because I would like to become journalist in particularly in the section of sport. I should this study when I was child, because I always like this. I like to create some kind of project, like movie, or just a presentation to expose a project. During last years I have create a small journal, who I write some kind of article about the team of rugby of my city, about football and about topic of culture. When I write an article I feel it's that what I want to do for the rest of my life.
When I was 15 years old, I have the chance to make a stage in the radio "France Bleu Gascogne" and I discovered a lot of thing about journalism. I was go to make an interview and in this moment I know that it what I like. Yet I saw a big journalist of group of TF1, in the BA118 in south of Paris. I have been the occasion to heard her, in the direct of tv. That was exceptional ! She have presented the plane of war, and she speak with colonel of the place. This memory was for me the best, and I keep a good memory. after this moment I would to learn more about journalism so I did some research and I like what I saw.
However the situation who is the most funny is when I encountered the French tv "la chaine l'équipe" in the stade of rugby in Paris when the young player of team of Paris played against Paris. I was happy to saw journalist of sport who I look in TV.
Last years I have talk of my professor about the section of information communication in university what I went to do. And my professor has encouraged me to go in this section. She has a big confiance in me and help me to do the good choice. She has present me to an old of this student who went in information communication and after to talk with her I have decided to imagine my futur in information communication and with the hope to become journalist.
 This webpage performs keylogging of input typed into a textbox.In other words, when focused on the textbox below, the page will record each time you hit a key or select text with your mouse. All of the data is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and is downloadable as a JSON file. More information about the motivation of this project and the format of the produced data are available here."
